Literature.Title: Tripropeptins, novel antimicrobial agents produced by Lysobacter sp. I. Taxonomy, isolation and biological activities.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Smith(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=25µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis JCM 5803(MIC=100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium JCM 5804(MIC=>100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12201(MIC=100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium NCTC 12202(MIC=>100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12203(MIC=>100µg/ml)
